text: Welcome to the testing phase! What do you want?

options.text: I want to help you testing the bot.
So are you. What is this project about?
So are you. Let us begin!

text: It's about an interactive history to help people know themselves.
After here we will begin a history and in a short future you will choose how it will end.
Unfortunately (or fortunately) we have a lot of work to do yet, so come back again later.
